articles.author: Alasdair Fotheringham
articles.title: Lefevere defends Evenepoel after he leaves the Giro d'Italia due to COVID-19 - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Soudal-QuickStep manager tweets: ‘It’s not a 9-5 job’
articles.content:
Soudal-QuickStep manager Patrick Lefevere has defended Remco Evenepoel’s decision to abandon the Giro d’Italia due to COVID-19, saying on Twitter “‘It’s not a 9-5” job.
Lefevere was responding to Wi… [+3110 chars]
